title: Grease trap waste valorization through hydrothermal liquefaction and anaerobic digestion: a circular approach to dairy wastewater treatment
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02245A, Paper
Daniela Cabrera, Ingrid Paz Adema-Yusta, Maria Jose Santibañez, Crispín Celis, Jefferson W. Tester, Rodrigo A Labatut
Grease traps are commonly used in the dairy industry to separate fats from their generated wastewater. Due to its properties, grease trap waste (GTW) is predominantly incinerated or landfilled despite...
